EmailTemplate.name: Junior School Musical Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Junior School Musical Invitation - Daniel: a Hard Act To Swallow! 17 & 18 October
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
I am delighted to invite you to our Junior School musical - Daniel - a Hard Act to Swallow!
Involving every child in the Junior School, and showcasing our wonderful musical talent it promises to be a very special evening indeed.
Friday, 17 October at 7.00pm; and Saturday matinee, 18 October at 1.00pm
I hope you will be able to join us. To book go to:
http://www.trybooking.com/101826
Regards
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia direct +61 2 9286 9507 mobile 0418 255 923 email BPerry@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
You are receiving this invitation as you have previously indicated interest in enrolment at St Andrewâ€™s Cathedral School. We would love you to come to our Junior School musical, however if you would like to unsubscribe from further invitations, please click here.
